original_text: Yes, the day of your punishment is here! Terrible trouble is coming to you! Like a tree that is ready to make flowers, your proud and wicked acts are ready for punishment.
korean_text: 볼지어다 그 날이로다 볼지어다 임박하도다 정한 재앙이 이르렀으니 몽둥이가 꽃이 피며 교만이 싹이 났도다

sentences.original_text: Yes, the day of your punishment is here!
Terrible trouble is coming to you!
Like a tree that is ready to make flowers,
your proud and wicked acts are ready for punishment.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 교만하고 악한 행위들이 벌받을 준비가 되었다.
